name: Timebot (JaminaGames)
description:
Ever want to travel back in time to fight historical figures? Now you can, in Timebot!

Travel to the past and face off against famous historical figures! Want to fight Napoleon across roofs of Paris? You can in Timebot! Go underwater to fight Julius Caesar in the Caesar Sub? You can in Timebot! Timebot is an action-packed 8-bit throwback to the classic action platformers, with an emphasis on time-travel and history! Are you ready to join the fight? Jump in to Timebot today!

System requirements:

if you can run another indie game, you can run this. If for some reason you can't run Timebot (and you're not using a computer from the stone age) or if you find a bug that need s fix, send us an email at contact@jaminagames.com

-Each purchase comes with a Windows, Mac, and Linux version. Please extract the files in the downloaded ZIP folder in the same directory

-With the Windows version DO NOT move the Timebot_Data folder away from the Timebot.exe file, or your copy will not work properly.

Version History:

Sept 1 - Version 1.0 released
